I am having the same issue as another at the post of: [Warnings when compiling a new MVVM Light Win81 project](https://mvvmlight.codeplex.com/discussions/498049) where I am getting several warnings about await not being called on asynchronous tasks and async methods running synchronous calls. Oh there is also a warning about the certificate not being found and not being valid for signing aswell.
